title: sick of players from china
body:
hello. im really annoyed so sorry if i rant for too long. 

i am SICK of CHINESE players on the OCE server. I dont mean chinese people living in OCE. i mean CHINESE people living in CHINA playing on OCE servers. 

this is a mess. why is it that league in korea is exclusively for koreans, why is league in china exclusive for chinese players. WHY CANT IT BE THE SAME FOR OCE. i am so annoyed of chinese players with a constant 500-600ms, trolling, and hardly know ANY english and saying CAO NI MA every 1 minute. get the fuck out of the oce server. plat and gold are plagued with these type of ppl. can you guys do something ???? like when you sign up you have to have a certain phone number type thing to verify you live in oceania???? thanks

replies.body: I'm impressed if they can hold down ranks in gold and plat with 600+ ping...
Well. You can still play on korean and chinese server, you just need an account and the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Cut,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=xMEqLvwz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-07T02:44:57.811+0000)
>
> Well. You can still play on korean and chinese server, you just need an account and the game.

no because in china you need to put your personal details in when you sign up, so that account is tied with them for life. if they get perma banned they can't make a new account. 

i have played LoL in korea & you need a kr phone number to sign up to have an acc

I mean, we have people in OCE playing in NA, and it's alright. it should be the same in this case. 
But i get how it's annoying how they lag and you cannot understand them.

>
> I mean, we have people in OCE playing in NA, and it's alright. it should be the same in this case. 
> But i get how it's annoying how they lag and you cannot understand them.

honestly people from oce should stop playing on na bc i bet it annoys other people when they have high ping. all servers should have a mobile authenticatior to verify where you're from. it would also help with the bot problem. the major problem i have is that they don't communicate with the team at all. most of my games in gold have been with people who only speak chinese which is a tad bit annoying
